Storyline

After the Battle of Gallipoli, in 1915, an Australian farmer, Connor
(Russell Crowe), travels to Turkey to find his 3 missing sons. While staying
at a hotel in Istanbul, he meets Ayshe (Olga Kurylenko), the hotel manager.
And tries to find a way to Gallipoli.
